mapper.select: select m.text, m.order_no, p.uri, pv.name viewpriv, px.name execpriv , mt.text category, replace(m.text,' ','') menuname from menu m join page p on (m.page_id = p.id) join privilege pv on (pv.id = p.view_priv_id) join privilege px on (px.id = p.exec_priv_id) join menu mt on (m.category_id = mt.id) where m.active = 'Y' and (px.name in (select privilege from user_priv where user= #{param1} ) or pv.name in (select privilege from user_priv where user= #{param1} )) union select dmi.text, dmi.order_no, dmi.uri, dmi.viewpriv, dmi.execpriv , dmi.category, dmi.menuname from dynamic_menu_items_vw dmi order by 6, 2
select m.text from menu m join reference_code r on m.menu_type_id = r.id where r.category = 'MENU_TYPE' and r.code = 'HT' order by order_no
